website_summaries.verdict: While not all previous DS owners should upgrade, the DSi is an ambitious and solidly designed portable gaming system.
pros: a bit thinner than the DS Lite
exclusive access to the DSi Shop for downloadable games and applications
cons: No longer supports Game Boy Advance games
lower battery life than its predecessor
Internet security settings are buried and confusing

customer_reviews.title: 🙌🏽Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I give this 1 star if it was an option to select zero stars I would have but I ordered this as a gift for my 5 year old and this item was damaged, not working at all. I’m going to pray for people that sell others items that does not work and damaged. My son was very sad on Christmas Day due to this item not working. We work very hard for our income so our child can have the opportunity to enjoy items such as this one. My child has been very disappointed as well as myself with this purchase. 😞😞😞Be Blessed & Be a Blessing to Others. 🙏🏽
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Gosh I Love it. Iam a true Mario fan
customer_reviews.text: Gosh I Love it. Iam a true Mario fan. And it is do nice to plat it again . Was worried about the size & Not being able to see it well enough to play it( like gameboy) getting older. No Problems, Thank u. It's an A+++*
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good over all
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but did come slightly damaged. I bought a used one, but it was worth the money I spent for it. The damage wasn't a big deal. The paint was wore off in a few spots, and there was a bite mark on the corner. Other than this it worked perfect, it came with a working charger, and a pen. It plays games well. The battery is good. I'm glad I bought it, despite the damage. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MySleepycloudASMR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I am always wary of buying electronics that are many years old. This product worked perfectly. I have no issues with it. The battery life is excellent. I probably played for well over 8 hours before realizing it needed charged. I bought an R4i card, and now have over 130 games that play flawlessly. I would highly recommend. This was a gift for my 5 year old. Keeps him busy during long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: nelle684

customer_reviews.title: Dai console
customer_reviews.text: Nice item although I returned it due to the size but overall is a great console. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 6-year-olds birthday. He loves it!!! He can now play against his sister.

customer_reviews.title: Completely unusable
customer_reviews.text: Mine showed up broken, don’t buy this. Everytime I tried to start a game it tells me there’s error and to turn off the dsi and check the manual. I watched vids on youtube trying to learn how to fix it and I couldn’t open the back because the screws were stripped and they are in there tight. I was unable to remove them. Thank u for the dsi that doesn’t work really enjoy getting scammed.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son . Even tho it's an older model he loved it . Works great and came in its original box and even came with its Charger. I'm very satisfied with this buy.

customer_reviews.title: DSi3, the kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a second one, they are hard to find since all the stores have discontinued carrying them. They do so many neat things. I love the camera option and how the kids can play with teh pictures after taking them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This portable DSi is a great product. It works fast and my son loves it plays alot of games on it!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I remember!
customer_reviews.text: My DSi came brand new (as expected) and works PERFECTLY! It's exactly what I remembered my old regular DS used to be but this one has the internet function. Now I can finally play my old DS games that I held onto for almost 6 years!

I am really happy we got it for him, it came right on time and he loves it so much he carries it with him all the time, even when he isn't going to be playing it. Really happy that it's easy for him to use all the different features that it comes with.

customer_reviews.title: The DS is a great toy for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The DS is a great toy for the kids. The lower stars are due to EZ Pawn not bothering to test or mention that the card slot was broken in the condition text. Fortunately, my son and I were able to identify a bent pin and fix it ourselves. Still, I would not order from them again.

customer_reviews.title: Not guaranteed by Nintendo

product_meta.title: Nintendo DSi 3.25" LCD Display Game System - Matte Blue
product_meta.description: The Nintendo DSi is a high-powered handheld video game system in a sleek, folding design—loaded with features like touch screen control for a unique gaming experience. Snap photos with the built-in camera, edit and send them to friends, play back your music with Nintendo DSi Sound, or browse the Internet with the Nintendo DSi Browser. From playing games to just playing around, the Nintendo DSi does it all.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars222 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
